alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Boone; Madison; Pierce (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 8:14AM CDT until September 21 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Antelope County in northeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Boone County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 814 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles east of Meadow Grove, or 12 miles west of Norfolk, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Battle Creek, Tilden, and Meadow Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
